Removing 1 Energy Marker from the game is equivalent to switching 1 card from your energy (with the same color as your Leader) to Rest Mode.

name: New Legend
effect: [Activate Main] If your Leader has 《Bardock's Crew》 in its special traits, play up to 1 <Bardock> with a cost of 5 from your hand.
getIt: Official Card Case and Card Sleeves Set 01 -Bardock-

name: Majin Kuu : DA/Majin Duu : DA
effect: [On Play] If your opponent has 6 or more cards in their hand, your opponent discards 1 card from their hand.

name: Tamagami Number One : DA
effect:
[Permanent][Opponent's Turn] If your Leader is <Vegeta (Mini) : DA>, increase the cost of your Battle Cards in your Battle Area by 1.
[When Attacking] Choose up to 1 Battle Card in your opponent's Battle Area and reduce its cost by 2 for the turn.

name: Trunks : GT
effect:
[Permanent][Opponent's Turn] If you have an energy marker, your non-<Trunks : GT> Battle Cards can't be removed from the Battle Area by your opponent's skills.
[On Play] Add up to 1 card from your life to your hand.

name: Son Gohan : Childhood
effect: [On Play] Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards with a cost of 4 or less and KO it.

name: Bardock
effect: [Auto][Once per turn] When you use a card in a combo while this card is in a battle, draw 1 card. Then, switch this card to Active Mode.

name: Son Goku
effect:
[Double Strike] (This card inflicts 2 damage instead of 1 when attacking.)
[On Play] Choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards and it gets -20000 power for the turn.
